subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants signed the former New Orleans Saints tight end Boo Williams and waived tight end Matt Kranchick. Williams missed the 2005 season after tearing an anterior cruciate ligament in the preseason and was released by the Saints in February. During the four previous seasons, he caught 107 passes for 1,143 yards and 12 touchdowns.
